title: The Leggings Gallery Women’s Cotton Blend Jogger Sweatpants with Pockets Lounge Wear Tapered Active Yoga Casual Travel Pants
features: PREMIUM DURABLE FABRIC - Crafted of 62% Cotton, 33% Polyester, 5% Spandex for a fabulously comfortable elastic waistband and adjustable drawstring for a custom fit

Perfect for a variety of activities, such as exercising, lounging, and running errands. Super comfortable and lightweight for everyday wear with the perfect amount of stretch, slightly tapered leg, ribbed ankle cuffs, and slanted front pockets for a flattering fit without compromising style.
EASY CARE Machine wash cold and tumble dry low
Customer satisfaction always guaranteed with a free 30 day return policy
description: These super soft, comfortable, and flattering sweatpants are designed to be stylish and versatile. They are the perfect sweatpants for everyday casual. Check out our wide range of bold fashionable colors.
Everyday Comfort and Indispensable Wardrobe Essential
Feel comfortable and relaxed running errands, working out, and lounging around the house. Easy to wear, you can style them with your favorite casual top for a trendy look.

These top-quality sweatpants are made from durable and soft fabric with just the right amount of stretch. The sweatpants come in vibrant colors featuring a cotton, polyester, and spandex premium blend.
Smart-Waist Design Available in SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE, and EXTRA LARGE Sizes

Amp up your style in these full-length sweatpants featuring a comfortable elastic waist band with an adjustable drawstring for a perfect fit. These leggings are a great addition to any wardrobe. Available in multiple sizes.

At The Leggings Gallery, we pride ourselves in providing premium quality fashion wear at affordable prices. You can buy with confidence and if you aren’t fully satisfied with your purchase, we will gladly offer you a full refund.
